channel.title: ::restart command
channel.description: Is there a way too add a ::restart command that would save all char files and restart the sevrer? :o

item.title: ::restart command
item.dc:creator: @rsg0d rsg0d
item.description:
@rsg0d wrote:

[quote=“I am beast, post:7, topic:415224”][quote author=rsg0d link=topic=517183.msg3756352#msg3756352 date=1316480398]
doesn’t project insanity have a command like this. ::update # #= the time you wish to start like ::update 10 the server will save all and restart in 10 seconds if not then here.

[quote]if(c.playerRights == 3) {
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“update”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your name”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/quote]
[/quote]

He obviously wanted a RESTART command. Not an UPDATE COMMAND. Learn to read, and not be a post whore.

/Flammed. smh.[/quote]
Your an idoit upate and restart the are the same thing learn your command. they both save the char files.

Read full topic

if (playerCommand.startsWith(“update”) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“your name”)) {
String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a;
PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false;
PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true;
PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
}[/quote][/quote]

He obviously wanted a RESTART command. Not an UPDATE COMMAND. Learn to read, and not be a post whore.

/Flammed. smh.

Read full topic

item.title: ::restart command
item.dc:creator: @rsg0d rsg0d
item.description:
@rsg0d wrote:

doesn’t project insanity have a command like this. ::update # #= the time you wish to start like ::update 10 the server will save all and restart in 10 seconds if not then here.

if(c.playerRights == 3) { if (playerCommand.startsWith("update") && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("your name")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::restart command
item.dc:creator: @sex-scape_owner sex-scape owner
item.description:
@sex-scape_owner wrote:

i haz it

	if(playerCommand.startsWith("restart") && c.playerRights == 3) {
			for(Player p : PlayerHandler.players) {
			if(p == null)
			continue;	
			PlayerSave.saveGame((Client)p);
			}
			System.exit(0);
			}

Read full topic
